sourcesContent:
export default {
  breakpoints: ["30em", "48em", "62em", "80em"],
  fonts: {
    heading: '"Inter","Kumbh Sans", sans-serif',
    body: '"Inter","Kumbh Sans",system-ui, sans-serif',
    mono: "Menlo, monospace",
  },
  colors: {
    gradient : 'linear-gradient(90deg, #7928ca, #ff0080)',
    primary: "#27ae60",
    danger: "#c0392b",
    info: "#8e44ad",
    dark: "#230C33",
    purple: "#592E83",
    accent: "#3b49df",
    accentDark: "#323EBE",
    background: "#fafafa",
    white: "#fff",
    black: "#000",
  },
  fontWeights: {
    bold: "700",
    light: "300",
    regular: "400",
  },
  fontSizes: {
    xs: "0.75rem",
    sm: "0.875rem",
    md: "1rem",
    lg: "1.125rem",
    xl: "1.25rem",
    "2xl": "1.5rem",
    "3xl": "1.875rem",
    "4xl": "2.25rem",
    "5xl": "3rem",
    "6xl": "4rem",
    "7xl": "7rem",
  },
};
